Balto (1919  March 14, 1933) was a black and white Siberian husky and sled 
dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome, in which 
diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage, Alaska, to Nenana, Alaska, 
by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease. ...
